Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.CLI.utils

Class SchoolMapPrinter

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.CLI.utils.SchoolMapPrinter
public class SchoolMapPrinter extends Object
SchoolMapPrinter role is to manage all the school map components that are printed on the command line interface with the help of a PrintSchool instance.
See Also:

    • initializePlayersSchoolOrder

      public void initializePlayersSchoolOrder(String playerName)
      Sets, at the beginning of the game, the order of appearance of the schools in CLI prints. The first school will always be the client's player school
      Parameters:
      playerName - the nickname of the client's player

    • changeOnlySchoolOf

      public void changeOnlySchoolOf(String player)
      Modify the school map grid by substituting only the school of the specified player
      Parameters:
      player - the player of which the school have changed

    • getSchoolOf

      private String[][] getSchoolOf(String player)
      Returns the school local grid map of the specified player, that contains the school, the school heading and the information about the last played assistant
      Parameters:
      player - the owner of the school
      Returns:
      the school local grid map of the player

    • getPositionOfSchool

      private int getPositionOfSchool(String player)
      Returns the y-position of the specified player's school in the schools grid map
      Parameters:
      player - the owner of the school
      Returns:
      the y-position of the specified player's school

    • addPaddingAndMargin

      private String[][] addPaddingAndMargin()
      Adds the border to the school, that contains the heading, and also adds padding and margin to separate the school map to the other parts of the global map
      Returns:
      the school map, decorated with padding, margin and borders
